comment: Сапер устанавливает мину и баркает по клику

languages.text: "Почтенный дух мины, молю тебя, позволь мне взвести запал и не разорви меня на клочки".
"Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
languages.original_text: "Почтенный дух мины, молю тебя, позволь мне взвести запал и не разорви меня на клочки".

traits.locale_text: "Venerable spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
"Venerable spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
"Venerable spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
"Venerable spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
"Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."
"Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

languages.text: "Ehrwürdiger Geist der Mine, ich flehe dich an, gestatte mir, deine Lunte zu entzünden, ohne mich in Stücke zu reißen."
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: "Ehrwürdiger Geist der Mine, ich flehe dich an, gestatte mir, deine Lunte zu entzünden, ohne mich in Stücke zu reißen."

languages.text: « Vénérable esprit de la mine, je t'en conjure... Permets-moi d'armer ta mèche et ne me réduis pas en charpie. »
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: « Vénérable esprit de la mine, je t'en conjure... Permets-moi d'armer ta mèche et ne me réduis pas en charpie. »

languages.text: “地雷里可敬的机魂，我恳求你，允许我操作你的引信，不要把我炸成碎片。”
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: “地雷里可敬的机魂，我恳求你，允许我操作你的引信，不要把我炸成碎片。”

languages.text: 「鉱山の尊き精霊よ、どうかお願いだ。あなたのヒューズでこの身を守って、体が引き裂かれないようにしてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: 「鉱山の尊き精霊よ、どうかお願いだ。あなたのヒューズでこの身を守って、体が引き裂かれないようにしてくれ」

languages.text: «Estimado espíritu de la mina, te lo suplico, permíteme armar tu mecha y no me hagas pedazos».
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: «Venerable espíritu de la mina, te lo suplico, permíteme armar tu mecha y no me hagas pedazos».

languages.text: "Ey mayının muhterem ruhu. Fitilini ateşlememe izin ver, beni paramparça etme."
languages.original_text: "Esteemed spirit of the mine, I beseech you, allow me to arm your fuse and tear me not into shreds."

traits.locale_text: "Ey mayının muhterem ruhu. Fitilini ateşlememe izin ver, beni paramparça etme."
